title: RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection

properties.name: description
properties.value: RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection is an album composed by James Hannigan and recorded with the Philharmonia Orchestra at Abbey Road Studios, it also includes tracks originally recorded with the Slovak National Symphony Orchestra for RuneScape 3 - The Soundtrack.[2] The album is available on CD, vinyl, and via digital streaming. CD and vinyl copies automatically come with a full digital download version.[3]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:RuneScape - The Orchestral Collection
RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection
Release date 14 September 2018
Artists James Hannigan, Philharmonia Orchestra, Slovak National Symphony Orchestra
Format(s) • Vinyl
• Compact Disc
• Digital (Downloadable, Streaming)
Label Laced Records
Genre Orchestral, Instrumental
Retail price EUR: €33 (Vinyl) • €14 (CD)
USD: $35 (Vinyl) • $15 (CD)[1]
Streaming platforms
    

RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection is an album composed by James Hannigan and recorded with the Philharmonia Orchestra at Abbey Road Studios, it also includes tracks originally recorded with the Slovak National Symphony Orchestra for RuneScape 3 - The Soundtrack.[2] The album is available on CD, vinyl, and via digital streaming. CD and vinyl copies automatically come with a full digital download version.[3]

Contents

  • 1 Tracklist
  • 2 Specification
  • 3 Credits
  • 4 Gallery
  • 5 Trivia
  • 6 References

Specification[edit | edit source]

Format Specifications
Vinyl
  • 2 x 12" vinyl
  • 33 rpm
  • 180 gram
  • Black vinyl
  • Gatefold sleeve
  • .mp3 digital download
Compact Disc
  • 2 x Compact Disc
  • Stereo
  • Gatefold sleeve
  • .mp3 digital download
Digital
  • .mp3 file format
  • Stereo

Credits[edit | edit source]

  • Music by - James Hannigan
  • Original compositions by - James Hannigan, Michael Manning, Sam Jones
  • Performers - Philharmonia Orchestra, Pinewood Singers, Slovak National Symphony Orchestra
  • Producer - Stephen Lord
  • Artwork by - Jagex Ltd
  • Copyright © - Jagex Ltd
  • Phonographic Copyright ℗ - Jagex Ltd
  • Licensed to - Laced Music Ltd
  • Manufactured by - Optimal Media GmbH

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Artwork for all releases.

  • Newspost image showing off the vinyl set.

  • Vinyl spread.

  • Compact Disc spread.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The physical release gatefolds use an original piece of art depicting the World Gate on the front and an overgrown statue of Guthix on the back. On the inside a world map showing locations from both Old School RuneScape and RuneScape 3 is used.
  • Each record has a small section of the world map in the centre; Morytania on 1A, the Southern Sea on 1B, the Western Provinces on 2A, and the Wilderness on 2B.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Laced Records. (Archived from the original on 13 October 2019.) “RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection (Deluxe Double Vinyl & Digital Download) £33.00, RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection (Double CD & Digital Download) £14.00”*
  2. ↑ Laced Records. RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection (Double CD & Digital Download). (Archived from the original on 14 October 2019.) “Featuring music rearranged by BAFTA award-winning composer James Hannigan (Harry Potter, Command & Conquer, Dead Space 3) and performed by The Philharmonia Orchestra at the world-renowned Abbey Road Studios in December 2017 and by the Slovak National Symphony Orchestra in Bratislava in 2012”*
  3. ↑ Laced Records. RuneScape: The Orchestral Collection (Double CD & Digital Download). (Archived from the original on 14 October 2019.) “33 Track Digital Download (MP3)”*
